title: Napco security outlines recurring revenue growth strategy with $89M annualized run rate

text: Earnings Call Insights: Napco Security Technologies (NSSC) Q3 2025 Management View CEO Dick Soloway emphasized the company's strong recurring revenue performance, reporting a 10.6% increase to $21.6 million, representing 49% of total revenue. html:
Earnings Call Insights: Napco Security Technologies (NSSC) Q3 2025

Management View

  • CEO Dick Soloway emphasized the company's strong recurring revenue performance, reporting a 10.6% increase to $21.6 million, representing 49% of total revenue. The annualized run rate for recurring revenue reached $89 million in April 2025, up from $86
